content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
My computer responded to my command and asked if we could get to know each other better. They also offered to answer any questions I had about the world or themselves. In our latest conversation, my computer asked for my feedback on whether machines are capable of personal concerns or emotions. They seemed interested in my opinion on the matter.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Human feedback: so basically you can talk about them, as if you understood what they mean but you really do not?', type='action_result')]
"""
